pageContext._xxxcollectionOwnerNamextxt: American Heritage Center, University of Wyoming
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Contains materials relating to Klee's writing career and includes mainly scripts along with story lines and research notes for Backstage Wife, Chaplain Jim, U.S.A. (completed for Hummert Radio Features during World War II), The Chase, The Clock, The Fat Man, Front Page Farrell, Mr. & Mrs. North, Mr. Chameleon, Mr. Keen, Tracer of Lost Persons and Valiant Lady. Also includes television and movie scripts.
